items.name: init(start: DateComponents?, end: DateComponents?)
items.desc: Initializes the object using the specified start and end dates.

items.name: init(start: DateComponents?, end: DateComponents?, recurrenceRule: INRecurrenceRule?)
items.desc: Initializes the date range to a repeating time period.

items.name: init(ekRecurrenceRule: EKRecurrenceRule)
items.desc: Initializes the date range using the specified recurrence rule.

items.name: var startDateComponents: DateComponents?
items.desc: The start date of the range.

items.name: var endDateComponents: DateComponents?
items.desc: The end date of the range.

items.name: var recurrenceRule: INRecurrenceRule?
items.desc: The rule for repeating the date range.

items.name: func ekRecurrenceRule() -> EKRecurrenceRule?
items.desc: Returns an Event Kit recurrence rule that matches the available information.
